name: Power Rangers Super Megaforce
description:
Power Rangers Super Megaforce is an action game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2014. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
Power Rangers Super Megaforce is available on Nintendo 3DS.
Brian Casentini (Super Megaforce) and Sally Campbell produced the game. It was directed by Charlie Haskell, Isaac Florentine, James Barr and John Laing. Noam Kaniel and Ron Wasserman scored the game.
